meanings.sent1: The brave knight reattacks the dragon to protect the village.
meanings.sent2: The army reattacks the enemy camp after regrouping.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel reattacks the bird feeder for more snacks.
meanings.sent4: The waves reattack the shore with relentless force.
meanings.sent5: The virus reattacks the body's defenses, causing illness once more.

meanings.sent1: The reattacks by the rebels caught the enemy off guard.
meanings.sent2: The general ordered a series of reattacks to break through the defenses.
meanings.sent3: The reattacks on the video game boss were getting more intense.
meanings.sent4: The reattacks of the angry bees made the hiker run for cover.
meanings.sent5: The reattacks of the storm caused widespread damage to the town.
